sentence: his morning, Home Depot ( HD ) declared its quarterly dividend of 47 cents per share, an increase of about 21% over its prior dividend.
Based on the current stock price, investors can expect a yield of about 2.4% going forward.
Shares of Home Depot were higher on the news, picking up 2.4% so far today.
In other dividend news, Lincoln National ( LNC ) maintained its quarterly dividend of 16 cents per share.
Extra Space Storage ( EXR ) maintained its quarterly dividend of 40 cents per share.
Frank's International ( FI ) maintained its quarterly dividend of 7.5 cents per share.
And Exterran Holdings ( EXH ) maintained a dividend of 15 cents per share.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
